snippet: The chef Alain Allegretti's menu is sometimes Niçois, sometimes Ligurian, sometimes neither, but it generally exhibits his command of modern French cuisine.
abstract: The chef Alain Allegretti's menu is sometimes Niçois, sometimes Ligurian, sometimes neither, but it generally exhibits his command of modern French cuisine.
lead_paragraph: In Nice, France, La Promenade des Anglais is a walkway along the sea where you can stroll while checking out the array of bathing suits worn by the people lounging on blue chairs on the sand below.

headline.main: Five Dishes at La Promenade des Anglais
